sentence.Network_en: Wealth was redistributed more equitably among society.
sentence.Network_cn: 财富实现了在社会中更加公平地再分配。

sentence.Network_en: We should equitably assess historical figures.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应该公正地评价历史人物.
土地得到更公平合理的分配.

entry.def: Something that is equitable is fair and reasonable in a way that gives equal treatment to everyone.

example.ex: He has urged them to come to an equitable compromise that gives Hughes his proper due...
example.tran: 他已经催促他们达成合理的妥协，给予休斯他所应得的报酬。

example.ex: We believe you can redistribute this money in a way that's equitable to take care of the poor of the inner city.
example.tran: 我们相信你能够重新分配这笔钱，以公平合理地照顾市中心的贫民。

sentences.sentence: "the inheritance was equitably divided among the sisters"

auth_sentence.content: It is high time kerosene were taxed equitably.
